enWisdom: The cause of corruption of piety is covetousness
A little cupidity corrupts a lot of piety

Wisdom: كَيْفَ يَمْلِكُ الْوَرَعَ مَنْ يَمْلِكُهُ الطَّمَعُ
enWisdom: How can one who is possessed by avarice possess piety?
Excessive covetousness is the symbol of lack of piety
One who clings to covetousness is deprived of piety

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُصْلِحْهُ الْوَرَعُ أَفْسَدَهُ الطَّمَعُ
enWisdom: One who is not reformed by piety is corrupted by avarice
Piety and avarice do not go together
